channel.title: EpicServer on EpicServer Documentation
channel.description: Recent content in EpicServer on EpicServer Documentation

item.title: Architecture
item.description: Learn about the core architecture and design principles behind EpicServer.

item.title: Basic API Example
item.description: Learn how to build a complete API with EpicServer, including routing, database integration, and authentication.

item.title: Installation
item.description: Learn how to add EpicServer to your Go project using Go modules.

item.title: Routing
item.description: A comprehensive guide to setting up routes and handling requests in EpicServer.

item.title: API Reference
item.description: Detailed documentation of all EpicServer’s public API methods and types.

item.title: Middleware
item.description: A comprehensive guide to using built-in middleware and creating custom middleware in EpicServer.

item.title: Migration Guide
item.description: Learn how to upgrade your application from EpicServer v1.x to v2.x.

item.title: Quick Start
item.description: A step-by-step guide to create your first EpicServer application.

item.title: Database Support
item.description: A comprehensive guide to using different database adapters in EpicServer.

item.title: Authentication
item.description: A comprehensive guide to setting up authentication in EpicServer.
